message:
This plugin scrapes data from a simple Google search to display you the information.
It requires scrapy library for Python (https://scrapy.org), and won't work without it.
While it's a nice idea, I find it extremely unreliable and hard to use.
Not recommended.
author: 11wallace11

message: It cannot use alias command... plz support

posts.message: Aliases only work in interactive shells. That wouldn't be possible here. That's a bash limitation.
